thread.title: This week's games: Temple vs. Tulane, Penn vs. Fordham
thread.title_full: This week's games: Temple vs. Tulane, Penn vs. Fordham

title: This week's games: Temple vs. Tulane, Penn vs. Fordham
text:
Mike Kern, Daily News Sports Writer Posted: Friday, October 9, 2015, 3:01 AM Tulane at Temple 
Noon Saturday, Lincoln Financial Field 
TV: ESPNU. Radio: The Fantatic (97.5-FM) 
Records: Tulane 2-2, 1-0 American Athletic; Temple 4-0, 1-0. More coverage SHOP: Collegiate Sportswear & Merchandise History: Tied 1-1. Temple won last year's finale in New Orleans, 10-3. Owls lost first Sugar Bowl in 1935.
About Tulane: Green Wave has won two straight. Beat winless Central Florida last week, 45-31. Lost by a combined 102-17 to Duke and Georgia Tech ... Tanner Lee threw for career-high four TDs against UCF ... Forced five turnovers against UCF ... In that game, long-snapper Aaron Golub became first legally blind player to appear in a Division I football game ... Had seven sacks last week as UCF had minus-35 rushing yards ... LB Nico Marley, who has team-high 35 tackles, is grandson of music legend Bob Marley. 
About Temple: Owls are 4-0 for first time in 41 years ... First home game since opener ... Jahad Thomas is fourth in nation in all-purpose yards (208 pg) ... Austin Jones has made 8 of 9 field goals ... Leads AAC in pass-efficiency defense ... Receiving votes in both polls ... Next week they host UCF. Fordham at Penn 
1 p.m. Saturday, Franklin Field 
TV: None. Radio: WFIL (560-AM) 
Records: Fordham 4-1, Penn 1-2 
History: Penn leads, 5-1. Fordham won last year in the Bronx, 60-22. 
About Fordham: The Rams, ranked 13th in FCS, won by two at FBS Army. Their loss was at home to Villanova by seven in rain ... They've won three straight. Last week was by 35-7 at Lafayette ... RB Chase Edmonds leads nation with 654 yards rushing (6.8 per carry). He also has 237 receiving, and has scored 10 TDs ... Kevin Anderson has thrown for 13 scores ... They've forced 11 turnovers ... JQ Bowers has three interceptions ... Stephen Hodge has 49 tackles. 
About Penn: Coming off historic win at Villanova, Quakers lost their home and Ivy League opener to Dartmouth, 41-20 ... First-year coach Ray Priore is playing a lot of young guys ... QB Alek Torgersen suffered a concussion last week and is questionable. Last week, Andrew Lisa came in to complete 15 of 21 for 126 yards and two TDs while playing the entire second half ... Next week, they're at Columbia, where former coach Al Bagnoli is in his first season. 
On Twitter: @mikekerndn
